item.description: I am having a Valentine Party at my house again this year. I ask that everyone bring what alcoholic beverage they want to drink, and a food item to share. I will provide the paper goods, cups, soda and of course my house. I hope that Steve will be able to bring his Karokee machine like last year we had a blast!!! Hope to see everyone on that night.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Third Annual Valentine Party at Antoinette's House
